explanation: We observe that the numbers in the blue parts add up to 7. Similarly, the numbers in the green parts also add up to 7. Thus, the pattern is that the numbers in the parts of the same color add up to 7.
deduction: Based on the pattern that the numbers in the parts of the same color add up to 7, the missing number of the blue part should be 6.
